text: Clément Couturier (born 13 September 1993) is a French footballer. He predominantly plays in midfield. Couturier was a youth player at AJ Auxerre before moving to FC Montceau Bourgogne and ASM Belfort. He also played for Dijon FCO and FC Chambly. Couturier played for Les Herbiers VF as they reached the final of the 2018 Coupe de France, facing his former teammates from Chambly in the semi-final.http://m.leparisien.fr/sports/oise/les-herbiers- chambly-clement-couturier-affrontera-son-ancienne- equipe-12-04-2018-7659480.php On May 8, 2018, he played as PSG won 2-0 to clinch the 2017-18 Coupe de France with goals from Edinson Cavani and Giovani Lo Celso. Couturier joined F91 Dudelange in the summer of 2018 signing a two year contract with the option of a third year. He played in the 2018 UEFA Champions League qualifiers against MOL Vidi FC scoring a goal and he played in the Luxembourgers successful run to the UEFA Europa League group stages as they beat CFR Cluj and Legia Warsaw. ==Personal life== His girlfriend is a midwifery student in Nancy. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:F91 Dudelange players Category:Les Herbiers VF players
title: Clément Couturier
